name: Aji Pangestu
title: Geography Education Graduate
summary: Bachelor’s graduate in Geography Education with experience in education, research, photography, videography, and content editing. Skilled in planning, implementing, and evaluating learning processes. Highly interested in education, services, environment, and creative industries. Proficient in Microsoft Office, photo and video editing applications, and professional camera operation.

experience.title: Team Member
experience.company: Inventory and Proposal of Geological Heritage Candidates
achievements: Conducted surveys and data collection of potential geological heritage sites.
Ensured accuracy and validity of collected data.
Participated in group discussions with Bapelitbangda.
Compiled reports and prepared presentation materials.
Created distribution maps of geological heritage candidates.
Collaborated with team members through meetings and online communication.

experience.title: Team Member
achievements: Conducted surveys and collected solid waste generation data.

experience.title: Team Member
achievements: Conducted surveys for a Local Wisdom-Based Natural Laboratory Model study.
Created thematic maps including soil, geology, slope, and administrative maps.
